product_name: TYR Special Ops 2.0 Polarized Swim Goggles - Women's
long_description: Go fast or go home with the women's TYR Special Ops 2.0 Polarized Swim Goggles. The #1 all-around goggles from TYR, they are engineered for triathlons, open water and training. Polarized lenses provide clarity, optical precision and comfort by filtering out 99.9% of the surface glare that causes eye fatigue. Durable, hypoallergenic silicone gaskets create a comfortable, watertight seal and maintain their shape over time. TYR Special Ops 2.0 Polarized Swim Goggles feature embedded antifog performance, unibody design and a wide peripheral range for optimal sighting.
short_description: Go fast or go home with the women's TYR Special Ops 2.0 Polarized Swim Goggles. The #1 all-around goggles from TYR, they are engineered for triathlons, open water and training.
